name: Slime Kingdom
description:
Slime kingdom is a half FPS half Adventure Game:
A Slime kingdom been attack by evil wizard,now there king must save his kingdom.He need to collect different kind of Slime eggs by killing monster and grow the Slime in the farm and let the grow-up slime to fight with him as his Slime Shooting-chariot's ammunition.Different kind of Slime has different ability.
